channel.title: [Challenge]Adding higher bank limits[Challenge]
channel.description:
[size=36pt]THIS IS NOT FINISHED YET, I AM UNSURE IF I WILL FINISH IT BECAUSE MY COMPUTER IS BEING A D*CK :([/size]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/of2b7t.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt]Adding higher bank limits[/size] [size=12pt]Requirements for success:
[ol][li]Must not affect the client side.[/li] [li]You can either: [list] [li]Change bankItemsN type to long(More efficient)[/li] [li]Change the bankItemsN length to 2x the bankItems length[/li] [/list]They both will have the same effect if coded correctly.[/li][/ol]
The layout would have two stacks of the same item in the bank, the first being the (2^31) counter.(How many "max stacks" the player has) The second being the current counter of the item. Tips: I will add these upon peoples request. Just tell me what your stuck on and i will update this guide, Though i figure the topic to be self explanatory. This will require editing of these methods:
[ul][li]basic 317 [list type=decimal] [li]bankItem[/li] [li]fromBank[/li] [li]resetBank[/li] [li]Variable: bankItemsN[/li] [/list]
[/li] [li]PI Please Give me the lists of the methods for these so this is a fair competition :) [/li] [li]DELTA Please Give me the lists of the methods for these so this is a fair competition :) [/li][/ul]
I think the Challenge for this is really the "itemInbank" portion, you have to check if there is two stacks or one. resetbank is really simple
DO NOT READ THIS IF YOU ARE TAKING PART OF CHALLENGE [code]
lol cheater I actually will be putting parts in here to make it a little more simple.
[/code]

[size=36pt]THIS IS NOT FINISHED YET, I AM UNSURE IF I WILL FINISH IT BECAUSE MY COMPUTER IS BEING A D*CK :([/size]

[size=14pt]Adding higher bank limits[/size]
[size=12pt]Requirements for success:

[ol][li]Must not affect the client side.[/li]
[li]You can either:
[list]
[li]Change bankItemsN type to long(More efficient)[/li]
[li]Change the bankItemsN length to 2x the bankItems length[/li]
[/list]They both will have the same effect if coded correctly.[/li][/ol]

The layout would have two stacks of the same item in the bank, the first being the (2^31) counter.(How many “max stacks” the player has) The second being the current counter of the item.
Tips:
I will add these upon peoples request.
Just tell me what your stuck on and i will update this guide, Though i figure the topic to be self explanatory.
This will require editing of these methods:

[ul][li]basic 317
[list type=decimal]
[li]bankItem[/li]
[li]fromBank[/li]
[li]resetBank[/li]
[li]Variable: bankItemsN[/li]
[/list]

[/li]
[li]PI
Please Give me the lists of the methods for these so this is a fair competition
[/li]
[li]DELTA
Please Give me the lists of the methods for these so this is a fair competition
[/li][/ul]

I think the Challenge for this is really the “itemInbank” portion, you have to check if there is two stacks or one.
resetbank is really simple
